comments.content:
Thanks!

Paratype's site provides this information about Arrus:

"Arrus is a font from Bitstream library. Arrus was designed at Bitstream by Richard Lipton and first released in 1991. Arrus is based on Lipton's own hand-lettered calligraphic alphabets that draw their influence from classic inscriptional forms."
I remember that long long thread about your logo and your avatar makes me smile every time. Perfect.
